thread.title: Countless women insist the pill causes them depression
thread.title_full: Countless women insist the pill causes them depression

title: Countless women insist the pill causes them depression
text: Why do so many doctors refuse to believe the Pill can cause depression? Countless women insist thatâ€™s what happened to them. Now a major study has backed their stories A study said women on the Pill are more likely to be treated for depression Becky Field is one woman who is convinced that the Pill had a damaging impact on her mental health after she began taking it as an 18 year old After she came off the pill, it took about a year for her to feel 'normal' again
